transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Good afternoon sir, Royal Sonic Marble se baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: Aha.
Executive: Shahzad sir baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Shahzad sir baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Sir main Dipika baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Aapne bola tha evening mein 4 baje ke kareeb hum ek baar try kar lena. Abhi aap free hain sir?
Customer: Abhi main matlab bike chala raha tha to matlab thodi der mein main khud hi kar dunga phone aapko aadhe ghante mein.
Executive: Thik hai, thik hai sir. Maine aapko WhatsApp pe message bhi drop kara hai, abhi dobara ping kar du sir message?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer was busy and asked to call later.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to call later.

- Executive offered to resend WhatsApp message.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- follow up, call scheduling, whatsapp message
